name: Deccan Herald
title: Top News Entertainment Today
content: **Top News** **ZEE5 unveils trailer of Diljit Dosanjh's 'Detective Sherdil’, a whodunnit set in Budapest** **ZEE5 unveils trailer of Diljit Dosanjh's 'Detective Sherdil’, a whodunnit set in Budapest** **'Panchayat' season four set for June 24 release on Prime Video** **'Panchayat' season four set for June 24 release on Prime Video** **#Suriya46: Suriya’s new film with Venky Atluri officially announced** **#Suriya46: Suriya’s new film with Venky Atluri officially announced** **British musician Passenger to embark on 3-city India debut tour in November** **British musician Passenger to embark on 3-city India debut tour in November** What to know about the immigration protests in Los Angeles Do you talk to AI when you’re feeling down? Here’s where chatbots get their therapy advice Explained | What are the ‘less lethal’ weapons being used in LA? Past instances where US Presidents ordered National Guard deployment Zeeshan Akhtar, conspirator in Baba Siddique murder case, held in Canada Not interested in being part of Bangladesh's next elected govt: Yunus Cities across US brace for protests as Marines prepare to deploy in LA Jaishankar meets EU leaders; discusses ways to strengthen ties, progress in FTA Renewing mandates & breaking barriers: BJP’s road to polls Mysuru’s DFRL understands gravity of astronauts’ food cravings High command’s order to conduct a fresh Caste Census a slap in CM’s face: BJP High command has decided to conduct Caste Census afresh, says Siddaramaiah
